top_comments.comment: The best Van conversion I’ve seen so far on a Small van. Where did you get the Couch/Fold down Bed from? Love the Kitchen & shower set up & finally a Fridge at a reasonable height so you don’t have to bend down. Nice.

I am a woman, alone in my van.  I have been looking for an awning and was wondering about your thoughts about your awning.  You said you could take it out part way?  Is it electric?  Does it drain the water well in rain? Does it hold well in wind?  Do you like it?  Your looks short in length; would one fit over your back doors?   
I appreciate your input particularly since you use your van as a part of your outdoor life.  Thanks.

This build shares top billing with the only other van with the bed up front that I have run across in over two years. If you don't have a skoolie, you really can't have four people in there at the same time.
 Very kool design and use of space !!
The up front bed with one or two swivels and/or that single seat ottoman..... make for a nicer cozy gathering place
